title: DECSAR-Based IT Problem-Solving Skills Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-optimized LMS-based training for current professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three types of IT system failures using the DECSAR methodology.
Learners can apply DECSAR step-by-step procedures in given scenarios to propose problem-solving solutions.
Post-assessment problem-solving scores improve by at least 20% compared to pre-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
